page.title: 06Shops
page.content: There is one shop in Ecton which is also the Post Office. It was the last shop of the Earls Barton Cooperative Society it has now been sold to a private owner. At Bellinge there are 3 shops. Bunces is a mini super-market, there is a Chinese take-away and a newsagents. We went into Bunces shop. We looked at the things for sale. We could buy milk, toys, sweets, ice cream, wrapping paper, books, drinks, wool, cards, newspapers and stamps. We could not buy pets, petrol and garden things. There is only one shop in Great Billing. That is the Post Office and general stores.There is a mobile shop called the Coop.It is a food van. The Post Office sells lots of things such as sweets, bread and toys.
